trans-unit.source: Provides URL encoding functionality for writers of out-going request parameters for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.
trans-unit.target: Gir URL-adressen koding funksjonalitet for forfattere av gamle gå forespørselsparametere for Web service-klienter implementert ved hjelp av HTTP, men uten SOAP.

trans-unit.source: UrlEncodedParameterWriter and other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: UrlEncodedParameterWriter og andre klasser i den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols>navneområdet støtter .NET Framework-implementeringer av webtjenester via HTTP-GET og HTTP-POST-operasjoner.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols>

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams.
trans-unit.target: Web service forfattere lesere serialisere og deserialisere henholdsvis mellom parameterne eller return objekter av Web-metoder og HTTP-forespørselen eller svar dataflytene.

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard.
trans-unit.target: Web service forfattere og lesere bruke HTTP til transport, men exchange ikke meldinger ved hjelp av SOAP-standard.

trans-unit.source: The abstract UrlEncodedParameterWriter class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter> class, adding URL encoding functionality for client-side writing of Web method parameters into HTTP request streams.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt UrlEncodedParameterWriter klassen arver fra abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>klasse, legger til URL-adressen koding funksjonalitet for klientsiden skriving av parameterne for Web-metoden i HTTP-forespørselen flyter.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>

trans-unit.source: You typically will not need to use UrlEncodedParameterWriter or its descendant classes directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger vanligvis ikke å bruke UrlEncodedParameterWriter eller de underordnede klassene direkte.

trans-unit.source: Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> to each Web method and sets the attribute's <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> property to the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: I stedet når verktøyet Wsdl.exe genererer proxy-Klientkoden i henhold til implementeringer HTTP-GET eller HTTP-POST, brukes den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute>til hver Web-metoden og angir attributtets <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A>egenskapen riktig type.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Hypertext Transfer Protocol--HTTP/1.1 specifies the use of a variation on Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) message format, which itself allows e-mail messages to specify different content types, both text and binary.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For HTTPS-protokollen--HTTP/1.1 angir bruken av en variasjon på Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) meldingsformat som selve tillater e-postmeldinger til å angi ulike innholdstyper, både tekst og binær.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Encodes all the parameter values for a Web method and writes them to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: Koder alle parameterverdier for en webmetode og skriver dem til den angitte skriveren.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the Encode method calls the other overload, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Encode%2A>, for each of the parameter values, including individual items in arrays.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten for metoden kode kaller andre overlasten, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Encode%2A>, for hver av parameterverdiene, inkludert enkeltelementer i matriser.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Encode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object that does the writing to the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>objektet som har skriving til HTTP-forespørsler.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The Web method parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Parameterverdiene Web-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Encodes a specified parameter value and writes it to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: Koder angitte parameterverdien og skriver den til den angitte writer.

trans-unit.source: The other signature of the Encode method, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Encode%2A>, which is called for each Web method, calls this signature of the Encode method for each of the parameter values, including individual items in arrays.
trans-unit.target: Andre signaturen for metoden kode <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Encode%2A>som kalles for hver Web-metode, kall denne signaturen for metoden kode for hver av parameteren verdier, inkludert enkeltelementer i matriser.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Encode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object that does the writing to the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>objektet som har skriving til HTTP-forespørsler.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter that will be encoded.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på parameteren vil være kodet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the parameter that will be encoded.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for parameteren vil være kodet.

trans-unit.source: Returns an initializer for the specified method.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en initialisering for den angitte metoden.

trans-unit.source: An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En initialisering er et objekt som ble sendt som en parameter i <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Initialize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter> class, the initializer is the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> property of the input <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter>klassen, er initialiseringen verdien for den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A>for inndataene <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo>objektet.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter>

trans-unit.source: The property is a <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> array.The GetInitializer method is invoked during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er en <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>matrise. Metoden GetInitializer aktiveres under initialisering av tjenesten.</xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>

trans-unit.source: Later, at the time a request is populated, the initializer object is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Initialize%2A> method of another <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter> instance.
trans-unit.target: Senere, når en forespørsel er utfylt, initialisering-objektet er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Initialize%2A>-metoden til et annet <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter>forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The other object performs the actual writing.
trans-unit.target: Det andre objektet utfører den faktiske skrivingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref> som angir Web-metoden i initialisering hentes.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the initializer for the specified method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder initialisering for den angitte metoden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method is invoked at the time a request is populated.
trans-unit.target: I initialiseringsmetoden aktiveres når en forespørsel er utfylt.

trans-unit.source: The input parameter, `initializer`, is obtained by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.GetInitializer%2A> method on another instance during client initialization.
trans-unit.target: Inndataparameteren `initializer`, hentes ved å ringe det <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.GetInitializer%2A>-metode på en annen forekomst under initialisering av klienten.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlEncodedParameterWriter.GetInitializer%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> array obtained through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>matrise som er anskaffet via den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters*>for den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref> klasse.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters*> </xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kodingen som brukes til å skrive parameterne til HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: An encoding, as represented by the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> class, defines how to transform characters into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Koding, slik det representeres med den <xref:System.Text.Encoding>klasse, definerer hvordan tegn i en sekvens med byte.</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Kodingen som brukes til å skrive parametere i HTTP-forespørselen.
